settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage application preferences, your persona, and APIs.

aiControl.title: AI Control
aiControl.description: Enable or disable all AI features of the application. Useful to avoid data consumption while editing.

visualTheme.title: Visual Theme
visualTheme.description: Choose the color palette for the interface.

customBackground.title: Custom Background
customBackground.description: Set a background image for the entire application.
customBackground.urlPlaceholder: Paste an image URL here (e.g., https://.../image.jpg)

uiLanguage.title: Interface Language
uiLanguage.description: Choose the language for the application's menus and texts.

generationLanguage.title: Generation Language
generationLanguage.description: Choose the language in which the AI will generate character content.
generationLanguage.tooltip: This will affect all AI generation tools.

persona.title: Persona Management
persona.description: Create and manage different user profiles ('Personas') to interact in chats. Select one to activate it.
persona.nameDescription: This name will replace `{{user}}` in dialogues.
persona.dialogDescription: Define the name and avatar for this Persona.

tokenCalibration.title: Token Calibration
tokenCalibration.description: Adjust the tokenizer so that the token count matches other platforms like SillyTavern.
tokenCalibration.label: Tokenizer to use
tokenCalibration.tooltip: Choose the tokenizer that matches the AI model you use on other platforms for the most accurate estimate.

apiProvider.title: AI Provider
apiProvider.description: Choose which AI service to use for generations.

googleApi.title: Google AI Settings
googleApi.modelTooltip: Make sure your key has access to the selected model.
googleApi.importantText1: Your API key is saved only in your browser's local storage and is never sent to our servers.
googleApi.importantText2: By using your own key, any Google API usage costs are billed directly to your Google Cloud account, not to CharGenius.

toast.notFoundDescription: Please enter your Google AI API key.
toast.successDescription: Your API Key is valid and has been connected successfully.
toast.failDescription: The key is not valid or does not have access to the selected model. Check the key and permissions.
toast.networkErrorDescription: Could not connect to the Google API.

horde.title: AI Horde Settings
horde.description: AI Horde is a distributed, crowdsourced network that allows users to access AI models for free, thanks to a community of volunteers. If you don't provide a key, you'll use anonymous mode.

resources.title: Resources and Help
resources.description: Find the user guide and follow the application's development.

appHeader.progressRingDesc: Indicates how complete the character's profile is.
appHeader.progressRingCompleteDesc: All key fields have been filled out.
appHeader.clearTooltip: Clear the editor and start a new character.

characterForm.title: Character Editor
characterForm.description: Create or modify your character's details. Changes are saved automatically.
characterForm.nsfwDescription: Relaxes the AI's safety filters for this character.
characterForm.firstMessagePlaceholder: The character's first message to the user.
characterForm.creatorNotesPlaceholder: Notes about the character, not seen by the AI.
characterForm.depthPromptPlaceholder: A specific prompt for the depth system.
characterForm.worldInfoPlaceholder: Key information about the character's world.
characterForm.fileTooLargeDesc: Please upload an image smaller than 4MB.
characterForm.avatarGenInfoDesc: Add a name or description to generate an avatar.
characterForm.unsupportedFileDesc: This form only accepts character files (.json, .png).
characterForm.characterImportDesc: "{name}" has been loaded into the editor.

chatInterface.welcomeDescription: There is no active character to chat with.
chatInterface.selectCharacterDescription: Choose a character from your gallery to chat with.
chatInterface.noCharactersInGallery: There are no characters in your gallery.
chatInterface.chatDescription: Test your creation's personality and dialogue.
chatInterface.chatErrorDesc: Could not get a response from the character.
chatInterface.chatRestartedDesc: The conversation has started from the beginning.
chatInterface.loadingChatWith: Loading chat with a new character...
chatInterface.notEnoughToSummarize: There's not enough conversation to summarize.
chatInterface.summaryDialogDesc: The AI has generated a summary of the conversation. Edit it if necessary and save it as a memory in your character's lorebook.
chatInterface.summaryEmptyError: The summary and keywords cannot be empty.
chatInterface.memorySavedDesc: The new entry has been added to the character's lorebook.
chatInterface.unsupportedFileTypeDesc: Currently, only plain text files (.txt, .md, etc.) are supported.

gallery.emptyDescription: Start by creating a new character to see it here.
gallery.title: Character Gallery
gallery.description: Explore, select, and manage all your creations.
gallery.confirmDeleteDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete {count} character(s).
gallery.deleteSuccessDesc: The characters have been removed from your history.

home.description: Your command center for AI-assisted character creation.
home.emptyGalleryDesc: Start by creating a new character to see it here.
home.actionCreateDesc: Start from scratch in the editor.
home.actionSuiteDesc: Use advanced tools to create and analyze.
home.actionImportExportDesc: Save or load characters from files.

characterDetail.notFoundDesc: Could not find the character, or the gallery is still loading.
characterDetail.creator: Created by: {name}
characterDetail.characterLoadedDesc: The character has been loaded into the editor.
characterDetail.exportPngErrorAvatar: Please upload a custom avatar to export as PNG.
characterDetail.exportPngErrorLoad: Could not load the avatar image.

tools.suiteDescription: A set of intelligent tools to boost your creativity, optimize your characters, and explore new narratives.
tools.sectionCreationDesc: Bring new characters to life with the help of AI.
tools.toolGuidedGenDesc: A step-by-step wizard to create characters with defined parameters.
tools.toolFullGenDesc: Create a character from scratch with a simple idea. The AI will handle the rest.
tools.sectionInteractionDesc: Test your characters and create dynamic stories.
tools.toolChatDesc: Chat one-on-one with the active character to test their personality.
tools.toolGroupChatDesc: Create interactive dialogues and scenes between several of your characters.
tools.sectionOptimizationDesc: Refine, improve, and combine your existing creations.
tools.toolIntelligentEditDesc: Modify your current character using natural language instructions.
tools.toolMergerDesc: Combine two characters from your gallery into a new one, following your instructions.
tools.toolRelationshipDesc: Create a dynamic bond (friendship, rivalry) and add it to their lorebooks.
tools.sectionAnalysisDesc: Advanced tools to add depth to your characters.
tools.toolOptimizerDesc: Summarize fields and detect repeated information to improve your character sheet.
tools.toolDevelopmentStudioDesc: Analyze your character's archetype and generate narrative arcs for their story.
tools.toolSenateDesc: Convene a dialogue between your internal archetypes to explore problems.

mobileNav.blankSlateDesc: Editor cleared, ready for a new character.

lorebookEditor.emptyAction: Click here to add your first entry.
lorebookEditor.formContentPlaceholder: The content of the lore entry...
lorebookEditor.formConfirmDeleteDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this lorebook entry.

senate.defineTopicDesc: Describe the problem, conflict, or decision the Senate must address.
senate.topicPlaceholder: e.g., I'm feeling a creative block with my novel and don't know how to move forward...
senate.convening: The archetypes are taking their seats...
senate.selectionNeeded: Please select at least one archetype and define an objective.
senate.integratedAIDesc: This tool will always use the built-in AI to maintain consistency.
